abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: expansion of
            the Company's copper and cobalt production facilities
            by 120,000 and 4,000 tons per annum respectively by the
            opening of two open pit mines; construction of metallurgical
            and ancillary facilities; expansion of the industrial and
            administrative infrastructure and construction of housing
            and social facilities for Company employees.
